attributes.action: Clarify the Government's position on the use of Imperial units of measurement
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have a non-authoritative statement by an EU politician stating that there is no EU objection to the use of Imperial measurements for trade internally to the UK.

However UK law still requires all measurement to be in metric with Imperial given only as a secondary indication; and UK law will still abolish  Imperial units at the end of 2009.

Packers will have to continue to pack in metric. It will be uneconomical to maintain two sets of measurement and the Government must commit to phasing out Imperial units

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
